002// Open Source Software; you can modify and/or share it under the terms of

004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.hal.FRCNetComm.tResourceType;
008import edu.wpi.first.hal.HAL;
009import edu.wpi.first.hal.util.AllocationException;
010import edu.wpi.first.util.sendable.Sendable;
011import edu.wpi.first.util.sendable.SendableBuilder;
012import edu.wpi.first.util.sendable.SendableRegistry;
013
014/**
015 * Class for operating a compressor connected to a pneumatics module. The module will automatically
016 * run in closed loop mode by default whenever a {@link Solenoid} object is created. For most cases,
017 * a Compressor object does not need to be instantiated or used in a robot program. This class is
018 * only required in cases where the robot program needs a more detailed status of the compressor or
019 * to enable/disable closed loop control.
020 *
021 * <p>Note: you cannot operate the compressor directly from this class as doing so would circumvent
022 * the safety provided by using the pressure switch and closed loop control. You can only turn off
023 * closed loop control, thereby stopping the compressor from operating.
024 */
025public class Compressor implements Sendable, AutoCloseable {
026  private PneumaticsBase m_module;
027
028  /**
029   * Constructs a compressor for a specified module and type.
030   *
031   * @param module The module ID to use.
032   * @param moduleType The module type to use.
033   */
034  public Compressor(int module, PneumaticsModuleType moduleType) {
035    m_module = PneumaticsBase.getForType(module, moduleType);
036    boolean allocatedCompressor = false;
037    boolean successfulCompletion = false;
038
039    try {
040      if (!m_module.reserveCompressor()) {
041        throw new AllocationException("Compressor already allocated");
042      }
043
044      allocatedCompressor = true;
045
046      m_module.setClosedLoopControl(true);
047
048      HAL.report(tResourceType.kResourceType_Compressor, module + 1);
049      SendableRegistry.addLW(this, "Compressor", module);
050      successfulCompletion = true;
051
052    } finally {
053      if (!successfulCompletion) {
054        if (allocatedCompressor) {
055          m_module.unreserveCompressor();
056        }
057        m_module.close();
058      }
059    }
060  }
061
062  /**
063   * Constructs a compressor for a default module and specified type.
064   *
065   * @param moduleType The module type to use.
066   */
067  public Compressor(PneumaticsModuleType moduleType) {
068    this(PneumaticsBase.getDefaultForType(moduleType), moduleType);
069  }
070
071  @Override
072  public void close() {
073    SendableRegistry.remove(this);
074    m_module.unreserveCompressor();
075    m_module.close();
076    m_module = null;
077  }
078
079  /**
080   * Start the compressor running in closed loop control mode.
081   *
082   * <p>Use the method in cases where you would like to manually stop and start the compressor for
083   * applications such as conserving battery or making sure that the compressor motor doesn't start
084   * during critical operations.
085   */
086  public void start() {
087    setClosedLoopControl(true);
088  }
089
090  /**
091   * Stop the compressor from running in closed loop control mode.
092   *
093   * <p>Use the method in cases where you would like to manually stop and start the compressor for
094   * applications such as conserving battery or making sure that the compressor motor doesn't start
095   * during critical operations.
096   */
097  public void stop() {
098    setClosedLoopControl(false);
099  }
100
101  /**
102   * Get the status of the compressor.
103   *
104   * @return true if the compressor is on
105   */
106  public boolean enabled() {
107    return m_module.getCompressor();
108  }
109
110  /**
111   * Get the pressure switch value.
112   *
113   * @return true if the pressure is low
114   */
115  public boolean getPressureSwitchValue() {
116    return m_module.getPressureSwitch();
117  }
118
119  /**
120   * Get the current being used by the compressor.
121   *
122   * @return current consumed by the compressor in amps
123   */
124  public double getCompressorCurrent() {
125    return m_module.getCompressorCurrent();
126  }
127
128  /**
129   * Set the PCM in closed loop control mode.
130   *
131   * @param on if true sets the compressor to be in closed loop control mode (default)
132   */
133  public void setClosedLoopControl(boolean on) {
134    m_module.setClosedLoopControl(on);
135  }
136
137  /**
138   * Gets the current operating mode of the PCM.
139   *
140   * @return true if compressor is operating on closed-loop mode
141   */
142  public boolean getClosedLoopControl() {
143    return m_module.getClosedLoopControl();
144  }
145
146  @Override
147  public void initSendable(SendableBuilder builder) {
148    builder.setSmartDashboardType("Compressor");
149    builder.addBooleanProperty(
150        "Closed Loop Control", this::getClosedLoopControl, this::setClosedLoopControl);
151    builder.addBooleanProperty("Enabled", this::enabled, null);
152    builder.addBooleanProperty("Pressure switch", this::getPressureSwitchValue, null);
153  }
154}
